    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start​(File directory)
        Starts a watch dog service for a directory. It automatically reloads the AuthorizationFramework if there was a change in real-time. Suitable for plugin development. You can control start of this service by a configuration parameter Configuration.authorizationWatchdogEnabled
        Parameters:
        directory - root directory for plugins

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the watch dog service.
